product_name: Oakley Swim Break of Dawn Bandeau Bikini Top - Women's
long_description: Get your splash on in the Oakley Break of Dawn Bandeau Bikini Top. Bright stripes make a stylish statement while strapless design means minimal tan lines. Stretchy nylon fabric with stretch-polyester lining allows easy movement; removable molded cups add shape. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Oakley Break of Dawn Bandeau Bikini Top featuers a removable halter strap that ties at neck for added support.
short_description: Get your splash on in the Oakley Break of Dawn Bandeau Bikini Top. Bright stripes make a stylish statement while strapless design means minimal tan lines.
